# NSImage.CacheMode.bySize

**Case**

Cache if the cache size is smaller than the original data.

## Declaration

```swift
case bySize
```

## Cache Options

- **NSImage.CacheMode.default**: Caching is unspecified.
- **NSImage.CacheMode.always**: Always generate a cache when drawing.
- **NSImage.CacheMode.never**: Never cache; always draw direct.

items.description: Always generate a cache when drawing.
items.name: NSImage.CacheMode.always
